item.description:
It is the last week of June and the final meetup of the month will commence with writing exercises. I will not be able to attend this week as I will be (fingers crossed) basking in the sun on a glorious beach. Still that is no reason why the rest of you can't meet up :) If anyone would like to volunteer to run the meetup, please shoot me an email.

Alexa
item.how_to_find_us: look towards the back of the cafe
item.name: June Writing Meetup Blow Out!
